price: 49. En alles hebben Wij in paren geschapen, dat jullie er lering uit zullen trekken.
arabic: وَمِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٍ خَلَقۡنَا زَوۡجَيۡنِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wamin kulli shayin khalaqnā zawjayni laʿallakum tadhakkarūna
